overview:
Paul is Head of Social Media for North America at WCG, where he oversees social and new media programming for the firm’s healthcare, consumer, and technology brands. Paul’s experience includes leading social media and search engine strategy for a broad range of significant and Fortune 500 brands. Having built and managed his own web property to acquisition in 2003, Paul is adept at creating top to bottom web campaigns that incorporate SEO, social media, web development, paid media, and interactive assets.

Paul’s current and former social media work has included Pfizer, Virgin, General Mills, IBM, Symantec, Coors Brewing Co, New Balance, Intel, Hansen’s Soda, Macanudo Cigars, Nature Made Vitamins.

relationships.title: Head of Social Media, North America
